function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low ventilation and heating scores in the building domains","Impact":"Potential discomfort and health issues for occupants, increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and heating systems, implementing air purification, and regular maintenance","Technologies":"HVAC system upgrades, air purifiers, smart HVAC controls","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building owner"},{"Description":"Low electricity domain score (17%)","Impact":"Limited energy supply, reliance on the grid, potential energy shortages","Mitigation":"Investing in onsite electricity generation and storage, enhancing connection to the grid, energy conservation measures","Technologies":"Solar panels, energy storage systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building owner"}]}
